content.en: Do you like potato chips, corn chips, or other crunchy food? Many gamers like crunchy food. They crunch on chips. They play games on their computers and crunch.
content.tw: 你喜歡吃酥脆的零食嗎? 很多遊戲玩家喜歡邊打電玩邊吃洋芋片。

content.en: Using a microphone, they talk to other gamers. Some gamers crunch and talk to other gamers... at the same time!
content.tw: 玩家會用麥克風跟其他的玩家對話，有一些玩家也會邊吃邊講話。

content.en: But many people don't like to hear crunching! It's annoying! But now Artificial Intelligence, or AI, can help. It erases crunching! How?
content.tw: 可是很多人不喜歡聽到這種討人厭的喀滋聲! 現在人工智慧 AI 可以幫忙消除噪音，怎麼做到的呢?

content.en: Five hundred people crunched chips in front of a microphone. They did this ten times. AI learned these 5,000 crunching sounds.
content.tw: 500個人在麥克風前吃洋芋片，每個人吃十次，讓 AI 學習這種噪音。

content.en: It also learned talking sounds. It learned that crunching and talking sounds are different. AI learned to erase crunching sounds but keep talking sounds.
content.tw: 它也學習分辨咀嚼聲跟說話的聲音，就可以消除噪音。

content.en: A company made an app that uses this AI. People can use this app with microphones on a computer. They hear themselves crunching. People in the same room hear them crunching. But... the people they're talking to on the computer don't hear crunching!
content.tw: 有公司利用這項 AI 技術研發出應用軟體，玩家把這個軟體用在電腦的麥克風上，就可以大快朵頤洋芋片，對方都聽不到。

content.en: With this app, you can crunch, crunch, crunch and talk to people on the computer. And you won't be annoying!
content.tw: 有了這個應用程式，你就可以在電腦前邊吃邊講話，而且不會讓人覺得討厭！

vocabulary.preface: 人工智慧應用軟體，可以消除吃東西的聲音!

content.text:
1. potato 馬鈴薯
Potato chips! 洋芋片!
Yeah, would you like some? 沒錯，你要吃一點嗎?
No. Potato chips are not good.不了，洋芋片不大好。

2. make 讓
They are too salty. 它太鹹了。
They make me thirsty. 會讓我口渴。
You're very careful with what you eat. 你對吃的東西真小心。
Are you sure you don't want some? 你確定不要來幾片?

3. corn 玉米
No, thank you. I prefer corn chips. 不了，多謝，我比較喜歡玉米片。
The ones without salt. 沒有鹽的那種。
Oh, I like those too. 我也喜歡那種。

4. in front of 在前面
I love sitting in front of the TV and eating corn chips and salsa.
我最愛坐在電視前面吃玉米片配莎莎醬。
Let's do it tonight.我們今晚就來吃。

content.en: Science is great! Science finds ways to help people. It's helping Mr. Oskam. Twelve years ago, he had a bad motorcycle accident. After the accident, his legs didn't work. He wasn't able to walk. He used a wheelchair for a long time.
content.tw: 12年前 Oskam先生遭遇車禍，雙腿無法行走，有很長一段時間需要依靠輪椅。

content.en: Then scientists put implants in Mr. Oskam's body. These implants are very small computers. He has two implants in his brain and one around his spine.
content.tw: 科學家在 Oskam 先生的腦袋跟脊椎植入訊號發射器。

content.en: Mr. Oskam also wears a special helmet. The implants, helmet, and a computer work together. Mr. Oskam carries the computer in a backpack on his back.
content.tw: 他也需要戴上特殊的頭盔，揹著裝有電腦的背包。

content.en: To move his legs, first Mr. Oskam thinks about moving them. His brain implants send a signal to the helmet. The helmet sends a signal to his spine implant. That implant sends a signal to his legs. Then his legs move!
content.tw: Oskam先生要先想著移動雙腿，他腦袋裡的發射器把訊號送到頭盔。再從頭盔送到脊椎，接著到他的雙腿，然後雙腿就可以移動了!

content.en: Mr. Oskam can walk slowly. He can stand and climb stairs too. And he can move more without help! He's very happy. Being able to move is very cool!
content.tw: 現在Oskam先生可以慢慢地走，也能站起來爬樓梯，不需要其他人幫忙，他真是開心極了!

content.en: Every day, scientists find new ways to help people. Helping people to walk again is great!
content.tw: 每天，科學家都在尋找新的方法來幫助人們。能夠再次幫助人們行走真是太棒了！

vocabulary.preface: 醫學科技讓這位受傷的人再度行走，是了不起的成就。

content.text:
1. leg 腿
Hey there! How are you holding up today? 嗨，你今天怎麼樣?
My legs are hurting after a long walk yesterday.
我現在腿痛，昨天走了太長的路。

2. walk 走路
Yeah? How long did you walk? 是嗎? 你走了多久?
About 10 minutes.大概十分鐘。
Only 10? 只有十分鐘?

3. brain 腦袋
Then I have to tell you, my brain hurts too. 那我得告訴你，我的腦袋也痛。
And the reason? 理由呢?
I had to climb that mountain of paperwork at the office.
我在辦公室爬了堆積如山的文件。

4. able 能夠的
So your brain worked overtime? 所以你的腦袋超時工作?
Indeed.確實是。
Well, at least we are still able to move around. 至少我們都還能活動。
That's true. 你說對了。

content.en: Once upon a time, there were big dinosaurs living on Earth. Why did they go away?
content.tw: 很久以前，恐龍還活在地球上，那牠們為什麼消失了呢?

content.en: Some people say a very big space rock hit the Earth in Mexico. The "kaboom" was so big that it hit all the dinosaurs. Did this happen?
content.tw: 據說是一顆超大的隕石墜落在墨西哥，讓所有的恐龍滅亡。真的是這樣嗎?

content.en: Some smart scientists have another idea. They say the dinosaurs are gone because of volcanoes in India.
content.tw: 也有科學家覺得恐龍是因為印度的火山爆發而絕種。

content.en: Volcanoes are special mountains. They have holes on top! Volcanoes rumble and grumble. And they shoot out fire!
content.tw: 火山會隆隆作響，還會噴出火焰。

content.en: At the time of the dinosaurs, volcanoes shot out lots of fire and smoke. This happened for a very long time. This made the air very smelly.
content.tw: 當時有一段時間火山噴出大量火焰跟濃煙，讓空氣品質惡化。

content.en: After many years, the volcanoes changed the weather. The world got very cold. These scientists think this is why the dinosaurs are gone.
content.tw: 多年之後，火山爆發導致氣候變得很冷，科學家覺得這才是恐龍絕種的原因。

content.en: So, what made the dinosaurs go? Was it the volcanoes, the big space rock... or both? Scientists are not sure now, but their ideas are very interesting!
content.tw: 究竟是什麼原因讓恐龍消失呢? 是火山，是隕石，還是兩個都有? 科學家還不確定，但是他們的想法很有趣！

content.en: Today, scientists look for rocks and dinosaur bones in the ground. This helps them learn more about what happened to the dinosaurs!
content.tw: 今天，科學家們在地下尋找岩石和恐龍骨骼。這有助於他們了解更多關於恐龍滅絕的原因！

vocabulary.preface: 有一個理論說火山爆發導致氣候改變，恐龍也因此滅絕。

content.text:
1. shoot 噴發
Can you imagine Datun Mountain erupting one day? 你能想像有一天大屯山爆發嗎?
And shooting out fire and ash? 然後噴出火焰和灰塵?
That would be so cool! 那好酷喔!
No, it wouldn't. 才不呢。

2. because 因為
Our weather may change because the ash would block the
sun.我們的天氣可能改變，因為火山灰會遮住太陽。

3. for a long time 長時間
But Datun Mountain has slept for a very long time. 但是大屯山已經沉睡很久了。
With volcanoes, you never know. 火山是說不準的。

4. scientist 科學家
I'm not worried. We have good scientists. 我不擔心，我們有很好的科學家。
Yeah, let's hope they don't fall asleep.對啊，希望他們不會睡著。

content.en: Do you know what people say about stinky tofu? The worse it smells, the better it tastes!
content.tw: 大家都說臭豆腐越臭越好吃。

content.en: In Europe, people say the same about cheese. They have lots of cheeses over there. What's the weirdest one? Mite cheese.
content.tw: 歐洲人也說起司越臭越好吃，他們有各種起司，最奇怪的是螨起司。

content.en: No, no, no! It's not MICE cheese! It's MITE cheese! Mites are very small spiders. They make cheese using their poop!
content.tw: 螨很像小的蜘蛛，牠們的排泄物可以用來做起司。

content.en: Mr. Poschel was a biology teacher. Now he farms mites. He has lots of dark, cool, moist boxes. They're full of millions of mites! He needs them to make mite cheese.
content.tw: Poschel先生以前是生物老師。他現在養螨，把牠們養在潮濕陰暗的箱子來做起司。

content.en: Mr. Poschel puts soft cheese into the boxes. Then the hungry mites get to work! They climb all over it! Eating and pooping, pooping and eating. Eat. Poop. Eat. Poop. Eat. Poop. They're making mite cheese!
content.tw: Poschel先生把軟質乳酪放進箱子裡，螨會爬到起司上，邊吃邊排泄。

content.en: Mr. Poschel waits for the mite cheese to get hard. Then he takes it out of the boxes. He's very careful. These mites eat fingernails too!
content.tw: 等到起司變硬了，就可以從箱子裡拿出來。他很小心，這些螨也會吃指甲。

content.en: His mite cheese is ready to eat. Some say it's tasty. Others want to try it. Spider poop cheese? No, thanks or yes, please?
content.tw: 他的螨起司已經可以吃了。有人說它很美味。也有人想嚐嚐看。蜘蛛便便起司？不，謝謝還是請給我來一點？

vocabulary.preface: 螨起司的做法真特別，有點兒異想天開。

content.text:
1. smell 聞起來
What's that you're eating? 你在吃什麼呢?
Seafood soup. 海鮮湯。
It smells very strong.聞起來味道很重。
Yeah, I added fish sauce.對，我加了魚露。

2. taste 嚐起來
This actually tastes really good. 它其實很好吃。
You made it yourself? 你自己做的?
Right, I learned it from a Thai teacher. 對，我從一個泰國老師學來的。

3. lots of 很多的
I know fish sauce is used in lots of Thai dishes.我知道很多泰國菜都用魚露。
Come, have some. 來吧，吃一點。
Wow! Delicious! 哇，真好吃!
I knew you'd like it.我就知道你會喜歡。

4. full of 充滿的
This soup is full of flavor! 這個湯味道濃郁。
Yeah, it's better than other kinds of soup. 它比別的湯都好。
Because it's easy to make.因為它很容易做。
